replies.body: This patch is tinier then the amount of skill it takes to play Garen or Darius.
{{champion:45}} Is that a short joke?!?

Gets new champion
Complains about lack of changes to the game
than*
Square up mate, square up!
Rip jungle Vayne 9/29/2015 never forget
is that the date or the kda
29 deaths may seem like a lot, but 2015 assists would make up for it I think.
lol I thought the guy was posting KDA, then I realized, Vayne can't have 2015 assists! She is more likely to steal half of them {{item:3070}}
If you do 2015 assists then you are very bad, it does not make up for anything; just learn how to end the game at this point.
No.
Support Vayne new meta?
well... the game was long {{champion:26}}
Not that long, just kept looping {{champion:245}}
The kill-jungle-diversity patch. Let's put those off-meta junglers {{champion:4}}, {{champion:10}}, and {{champion:67}} back where they "belong". We need more {{champion:11}} jungles.

My Teemo jungle is crying.
:<
So am I. Crying tears of joy. You monster.

Make up your mind on role diversity people. They let a melee champ an ADC and you just complain about it. They take away the unintended buff to ranged junglers, and you complain (Yes I know Morde has stupid damage, but he's very easily countered, and my point is that most league players do nothing but complain).
The only reason sated devourer is getting nerfed is because riot is releasing a furry kalista(kindred).
You mean the combo of kalista and bard. AKA Kalistard
Can't have people breaking the meta...gotta have people go the champions sated devourer was 'designed for' instead of having people be able to experiment.

They aren't removing ranged junglers because they are "out of meta". They are nerfing the Sated Devourer on ranged junglers because it gave them way too much power compared to melee junglers. They also changed it for Kindred, since they would be overpowered with the passive procing every 2 auto attacks. You can still jungle with ranged junglers, you just don't have as much free power as before (more skill involved now).
solid patch
rock solid
{{champion:54}}
Someone wanna explain the {{champion:21}} obsession in the patch notes?

Have you not seen the way she struts around the rift shaking that {{champion:22}} ?

Feisty attitude,firey red hair, and an hourglass figure, and you question the obsession.

"Fixed a bug where Judgment was dealing damage to the Villain equal to 1% of Garen’s Health rather than the Villain’s" 
I see why Garen was so damn op, stack hp and deal tons of damage
I love devourer and i have a little question... Is aatrox a ranged champion?!{{champion:266}} {{item:3035}}
Yeah, man. His sword is just for show.

I'm kindred disappointed at how little this patch has.

I'll see myself out.
Maybe we just WOLFed down this patch too quickly.
I'm lambenting the fact people keep making these puns.
These jokes will be the death of me.
naw, they will never kill you.... That would be too..... nice? kind? caring? yeah no buddy, you are stuck with these jokes forever. :P
Nuuuu, I ask for Lamb but get Wolf instead? I was lied to! D:
The unseen bug is the deadliest. Heh.
Upvoted just because it's a {{champion:238}} joke :D
Shadowfire Bard pls.
Can we get an IP refund if we already have those runes?
This is like asking a refund of $100 because your ps4 went from $500 to $400. The answer will always be no.
If a game goes on sale the day after you buy it on steam you get the diffrence :^)
Can I get an huge refund on my 16 year old car since it's cheaper now?
Is Karma ever going to get damage back on her ulti or can I just refund all the skins I bought of her?
Karm has amazing damage, what are you talking about?

> [{quoted}](name=frafdo121333,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=OGnczEXw,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-09-29T19:24:59.972+0000)
>
> Karm has amazing damage, what are you talking about?

Umm, I wouldn't call it Amazing. It's a little lower than most other mages. However, she has decent safety, some cc, and is hella fun to play. I really like her and have lvl 5 mastery of her on multiple accounts. MAYBE she could use the damage back on her Matra E, maybe. Or maybe a bit more reliability when choosing to Mantra her W, like not make the root/snare instant, but maybe the damage could be upfronted(there is no damage boost on her Mantra W) instead of over time or something. But, overall she's in an acceptable place right now. I have a blast playing her and am quite satisfied if they don't even touch her. Probably better that way so they don't come back and nerf bat her for accidentally making her too strong.

When I play Karma support, with support masteries, I regularly out damage the ADC and I'm often the top damage on team, if not in game. Combine that with the utility and move speed from her E and you have an extended teamfight powerhouse; if a teamfight with a karma lasts more than 15 seconds, the karma's team has won the fight, no exceptions.

Mantra E -does- do damage, in a splash around the target.

Mantra W also gets damage boosted. It also heals you for 20% missing health in two separate instances.

Karma is one of those odd picks in that, she doesn't add much flat power like most champs do. Rather, her power is in making your team badass by slowing and snaring enemies, shielding where needed, and being a siren to help your squishies.

I agree that Karma's in a strong place right now, but she's significantly stronger than you depict. Really the only thing that can stop her is a heavy CC engage tank opposite you in lane. Leona and blitz will fuck Karma up early game, and then its hard for her to catch up, but if she gets even a little bit ahead, she can take that lead and burn with it.

> [{quoted}](name=Triskael,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=OGnczEXw,comment-id=0005000000010000,timestamp=2015-09-29T22:16:52.027+0000)
>
> When I play Karma support, with support masteries, I regularly out damage the ADC and I'm often the top damage on team, if not in game. Combine that with the utility and move speed from her E and you have an extended teamfight powerhouse; if a teamfight with a karma lasts more than 15 seconds, the karma's team has won the fight, no exceptions.
> 
> Mantra E -does- do damage, in a splash around the target.
> 
> Mantra W also gets damage boosted. It also heals you for 20% missing health in two separate instances.
> 
> Karma is one of those odd picks in that, she doesn't add much flat power like most champs do. Rather, her power is in making your team badass by slowing and snaring enemies, shielding where needed, and being a siren to help your squishies.
> 
> I agree that Karma's in a strong place right now, but she's significantly stronger than you depict. Really the only thing that can stop her is a heavy CC engage tank opposite you in lane. Leona and blitz will fuck Karma up early game, and then its hard for her to catch up, but if she gets even a little bit ahead, she can take that lead and burn with it.

The damage on her Mantra E was removed in patch 5.10, so no, she doesn't. It USED to. Mantra W also does not get damage boosted that was also removed back in 5.10. It purely gains snare duration and the missing health heal, which is nice. 

Like I said, her damage is acceptable but most mages can put out more burst. Go compare abilities and you will find most mages have slightly higher damage on their main ability than Karma does on her base Q, usually through a slightly higher ratio and slightly higher base damage, and Karma's W isn't terribly reliable for damage output during large team fights that you were not already winning. Sure Karma's Mantra Q hits like a truck, but that is her ult and it consumes her Q usage as well so its not really as big as it looks when you remember you just used two abilities, and it requires people to actually stand in the pop. While most mages have combos that output a little more damage than Karma's will, Karma makes up for it in other ways. I love her, but damage is not really her strength. Her strength is her versatility.

And yeah, you can out damage the ADC because you have roughly half the game where you are pushing AOE damage out and they *might* be getting an auto attack in here or there. A lot of poke/burst supports do the same thing. Total damage is a deceiving stat. It's a nice indicator of activity but it's more important that damage be applied at the right time to the right target.

> **Resolved a cause of random disconnects in the client. If you disabled Windows IP Helper to mitigate the problem, you can now safely re-enable it!**

I haven't been having this problem, but really nice fix for those that have. Disconnections caused by the client are the worst.
